courseName: Middle East Entrepreneurs of Tomorrow (CS Instructor)
details: Developed curriculum and taught second year high school students web development
Students worked in groups to develop a web app on social issues they were passionate about
Created teaching content for engineering interactive technologies
Provided technical guidance to students in coding, electronics, 3D printing, laser cutting, and other related, fabrication techniques and monitoring the machine shop

courseName: 11.111 Leadership in Negotiation: Advanced Applications (Undergraduate TA)
details: Shaped the pedagogy of negotiation through applications in management, public policy, social entrepreneurship, international diplomacy, and scientific discovery
Facilitated teaching by observing class dynamics and providing individual feedback to students on communication, decision-making, and leadership skills
Trained first year students on electronics and maker tools, e.g. drill press, band saw, sander, 3D printer, laser cutter
